text.autoconfig.reinfgolem.title: Reinforced Copper Golem Config
text.autoconfig.reinfgolem.option.inputC:
A list of container IDs that Copper Golems can take items from.
Example: 'minecraft:chest'
text.autoconfig.reinfgolem.option.output: A list of container IDs that Copper Golems can deposit items into.
text.autoconfig.reinfgolem.option.allowR: If enabled, Copper Golems will use the 'Input Containers' list to decide where to pull items from.
If enabled, Copper Golems will use the 'Output Containers' list to decide where to deposit items.
